isEnabled.description: Indicates whether Defender for Storage is enabled on this storage account.

overrideSubscriptionLevelSettings.description: Indicates whether the settings defined for this storage account should override the settings defined for the subscription.

onUpload.description: Properties of On Upload malware scanning.

scanResultsEventGridTopicResourceId.description: Optional. Resource id of an Event Grid Topic to send scan results to.

blobScanResultsOptions.description: Optional. Write scan result on BlobIndexTags by default.

automatedResponse.description: Optional. Specifies the automated response action to take when malware is detected.

operationStatus.description: Upon failure or partial success. Additional data describing Malware Scanning enable/disable operation.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether On Upload malware scanning should be enabled.

capGBPerMonth.description: Defines the max GB to be scanned per Month. Set to -1 if no capping is needed. If not specified, the default value is -1.

filters.description: Optional. Determine which blobs get scanned by On Upload malware scanning. An Or operation is performed between each filter type.

excludeBlobsWithPrefix.description:
Optional. A list of prefixes to exclude from on-upload malware scanning.
Format: `container-name/blob-name` (start with the container name; do not include the storage account name).
Exclude entire containers: Use prefix of container names you want to exclude without a trailing `/`.
Exclude a single container: Add a trailing slash `/` after the container name to avoid excluding other containers with similar prefixes.

excludeBlobsWithSuffix.description: Optional. A list of suffixes to exclude from on-upload malware scanning. Suffixes match only the end of blob names, and should be used for file extensions or blob name endings only.

excludeBlobsLargerThan.description: Optional. Specifies the maximum size in bytes for blobs to be scanned. This parameter accepts a single positive integer value. Blobs larger than this value will be excluded from scanning.

message.description: Additional information regarding the success/failure of the operation.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether Sensitive Data Discovery should be enabled.

operationStatus.description: Upon failure or partial success. Additional data describing Sensitive Data Discovery enable/disable operation.

scanStatus.description: A status code of the scan operation.

scanStatusMessage.description: A description of the status of the scan.

scanStartTime.description: The time at which the scan had been initiated.

scanEndTime.description: The time at which the scan has ended. Only available for a scan which has terminated.

scanSummary.description: A summary of the scan results.

blobs.description: A summary of the scan results of the blobs that were scanned.

estimatedScanCostUSD.description: The estimated cost of the scan. Only available for a scan which has terminated.

totalBlobsScanned.description: The total number of blobs that were scanned.

maliciousBlobsCount.description: The number of malicious blobs that were detected during the scan.

skippedBlobsCount.description: The number of blobs that were skipped.

failedBlobsCount.description: The number of failed blob scans.

scannedBlobsInGB.description: The number of gigabytes of data that were scanned.
